body.raw:
See how your queries route through **sovereign infrastructure**.  
Your data travels intelligently across our global mesh — always private, always observable, always under your control.

- **Prompt simulation** — type a query, watch it route across data centres.  
- **Ravens in orbit** — Huginn & Muninn visualize foresight and memory.  
- **Energy metrics** — see the real carbon cost of AI runs, and how IntegAI minimises it.
